name: 350 Paracord Adjustable Survival Bracelet - OLIVE DRAB
description:
Fashion meets function, meets bad-assery. Yes, I used that as an adjective.

What is a Survival Bracelet?: A survival bracelet is made out of one single piece of 10-12 foot Paracord woven into a bracelet that can be unraveled and used in an emergency or survival situation. (Shoelaces, Laundry Line, Shelter making, etc.) They can also just be worn as an accessory :)

These 350 strength Paracord Bracelets are handmade by me, each made-to-order. They are built to last and feature and ADUSTABLE stainless steel Anchor Shackle and buckle closure. This gives you about .5 of an inch adjustability.

Bracelets are made a standard size, (23cm/9 inches) and fit a 7.5 - 9 inch wrist comfortably depending on how loose you like to wear your bracelet. If you need a smaller or bigger size, please chose from the options below! This listing is for a OLIVE DRAB bracelet. Check out my shop for other colours or the option to have a custom colour made!

Each bracelet is carefully packaged in a hand-stamped muslin bag and in a sturdy mailer to ensure it makes it to you safely.

Please allow 3 days after the order is placed for me to make and ship your bracelet to you. Most orders are shipped next business day. I will email you a tracking number once it is sent. My shipping costs include packaging material and tracking/insurance.

I guarantee my bracelets against breakage/fraying in the first year. Return/Guarantee instructions will be shipped with your bracelet!

Thank you! Please don't hesitate to ask any questions you may have.
